name: SLEND-OFF
description:
This is in development! Well, it's actually finished, but bugs may be present, cause I didn't playtest. Feel free to type a found bug/glitch in the comments. Even if it isn't a bug it will help develop the game and you will get no hate.

Hi! I found a new bug by playtesting. Where u couldn't walk into a house. Please redownload the game for the patched version!

Btw shovel is at a dead end.
